testcase.name: Deployment
testcase.system-out: Given I Open To Chrome Browser..............................................passed And I go to application.....................................................passed And screen to maximize......................................................passed When I open login page......................................................passed And I see login in page username textbox element............................passed And I see login in page password textbox element............................passed When I fill login in page:..................................................passed And I click login in page login button element..............................passed Then I see home in page profile name element................................passed When I save in home page profile name element, get text and save the profile.passed Then I verify the profile equals "bites otomasyon" with text................passed And I wait to 5 seconds.....................................................passed Then I see home in page elektronic categories element.......................passed When I save in home page elektronic categories element, get text and save the electronic name.passed Then I verify the electronic name equals "Elektronik" with text.............passed Then I not verify the electronic name equals "TestAutomation" texts.........passed
